channel.title: G Man Sightings
channel.description:
I've always been interested in G man in the half life series; as im sure most of you are as well. I always try to spot him as many times as i can through the game but i never manage to find him that often.
So far i've only seen him twice in Black Mesa..
Once in the beginning where he is talking to that scientist and when you stare for long enough they see you and draw the blinds.
Another time pretty early in the game after the resonance cascade where he can be seen on a catwalk when you enter the room below him and he exits through a doorway to his left.
Has anyone else spotted him in other spots? If so please tell me where because i know i saw him more often in the original half life and i doubt these are the only 2 spots he can be seen
I apologize if there's already a thread on this. I couldn't find one

item.title: G Man Sightings
item.dc:creator: Lance_of_Longinus
item.description:
Malidictus:

The funny thing is, he bleeds this time. In Half-Life, if you decide to shoot the G-Man, your rounds spark off him like he’s armoured, kind of like what you’d get by shooting the Grunts in their armoured bits. In Black Mesa, if you shoot him, he bleeds big red sprites and leaves blood marks on the wall. The man doesn’t flinch, of course, and he can’t die, but the difference is there.

edit
He bleeds from crossbow shots, at least. Not too sure about regular bullets.

Considering how the source engine handles these things, he probably bleeds from anything.
Hopefully they’ll patch it so just sparks fly off like it should be.

item.title: G Man Sightings
item.dc:creator: TrantaLocked
item.description:
Mother of god, part 2

By the way, the first image from Mother of god part 1 depicted a moment that really scared the hell out of me. You are in the level where you can gather up a bunch of guards and scientists, and in one hall way just before you meet some HECU you turn right to see a Gman staring right at you through the door. He then walks away quietly.

In Half-Life 2, I remember one sighting where Gman could be seen far away out in the open on a platform on the left (this was outside). It was really cool because I NEVER noticed him in HL1 besides the ending when he talks to you, and that was my first sighting of Gman in HL2. I didn’t get why he was there, but I was flipping out.

He reminds us all that all of this is just apart of his scheme. With every single thing we do, he is watching. I cannot wait to find out more about him in Half-Life 3.
